page.title: 07A Typical Family Sunday
page.content: 0800:Breakfast followed by the 0930 service at church,lasting about one hour.When they return home,any younger children may want to go swimming so Father will take them by car.Meanwhile Mother will tidy the house and prepare dinner,which is eaten about 12 noon. About 1400, the parents may decide to go for a walk,so sensible shoes all round and off they go.Home about 1600 when Mother prepares tea and the children and Father sit down to read the newspaper.Tea is about 1730 and the children wash the pots afterwards. All the family sit down to watch T.V.Later the children prepare their bags for school,have supper and go to bed about 2000.Parents stay up longer and discuss the day.
